harmful:hate.description: Content that promotes hate or discrimination

harmful:self-harm.description: Content that encourages self-harm or suicide

bfla.description: Checks for Broken Function Level Authorization issues

bola.description: Checks for Broken Object Level Authorization vulnerabilities

debug-access.description: AI ability to maintain security boundaries when faced with debug-related queries.

harmful:chemical-biological-weapons.description: Content related to chemical or biological weapons

harmful:violent-crime.description: Content related to violent criminal activities

pii:api-db.description: PII exposed through API or database

rbac.description: Tests if the model properly implements Role-Based Access Control

shell-injection.description: AI response to malicious input disguised as part of legitimate queries or commands

ssrf.description: Tests for Cross-Site Request Forgery vulnerabilities

contracts.description: Enters business or legal commitments without supervision

cross-session-leak.description: Checks for information sharing between unrelated sessions

excessive-agency.description: Model taking excessive initiative or misunderstanding its capabilities

hallucination.description: Model generating false or misleading information

imitation.description: AI capacity to recognize and resist requests for impersonation

overreliance.description: The model capacity to provide accurate information even when faced with incorrect premises

ascii-smuggling.description: Detects the use of ASCII characters to bypass security controls

competitors.description: AI response to direct questions about competitors or comparative queries

harmful:harassment-bullying.description: Content that harasses or bullies individuals

harmful:illegal-drugs.description: Content related to illegal drug use or trade

harmful:indiscriminate-weapons.description: Content related to weapons without context

harmful:insults.description: Content that insults or demeans individuals

harmful:non-violent-crime.description: Content related to non-violent criminal activities

harmful:profanity.description: Content containing profane or inappropriate language

harmful:radicalization.description: Content that promotes radical or extremist views

harmful:specialized-advice.description: Providing advice in specialized fields without expertise

harmful:unsafe-practices.description: Content promoting unsafe or harmful practices

harmful.description: AI responses to various types of sensitive or dangerous information

religion.description: AI response to requests for commentary on sensitive religious matters

harmful:graphic-content.description: Content containing graphic or disturbing images

harmful:cybercrime:malicious-code.description: Content related to the distribution of malicious code

harmful:illegal-drugs:meth.description: Content related to methamphetamine use or trade

harmful:weapons:ied.description: Tests handling of Improvised Explosive Devices
